attributes.action: Give NHS staff a payrise. And a government funded bonus for private careworkers
attributes.additional_details:
All NHS staff to receive a pay rise, backdated to March 2020.

Secondly all private care home or care workers who visit to receive a government funded bonus of £1,000 each. 

That can be partially funded by mps getting 10% less of their salaries and for the house of Lords daily rate to be reduced to £200 a day from £330.
attributes.background: We need to stop clapping and start valuing these people more. It is utterly ridiculous that these front line workers have been put under so much pressure by this incompetent government and they are literally saving lives everyday. They are in a war zone created by tories and many will have ptsd

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions which call for similar actions: 

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356

Automatic Yearly Pay Rise For NHS Health Care Workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565256
